On one-week long research stay at the University of Twente at the department of Psychology, Health and Technology. Here, to engage with local researchers and develop cross-institutional collaboration on topics relevant for improving health ageing in migrant older populations. 

Many interesting collaborative works planned as a result including on health, technology, and migrant older populations. 

Visits of colleagues in Luxembourg are planned for November and tentatively Spring 2025. Stay tooned for further updates.
